Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER among all process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurrences in variants that eventually result in Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any approval or rejection activity within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of approval-request activities (including Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that occur after a prior rejection (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are part of re-submission loops (i.e., preceded by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER or Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of total cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER appears but is never resolved (no subsequent approval or rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants with more than one pre-approval cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that directly precede Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events associated with claims exceeding 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Fraction of all pre-approver-related paths (involving PRE_APPROVER) that begin with Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are followed within the same trace by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, contributing directly to the goal metric
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of successful approvals (Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER) to total Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER requests
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events per year to detect temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurring in 2018 versus 2017, reflecting university-wide policy changes
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases
